item.title: The Verge’s guide to Amazon Prime Day 2024
item.description:
Amazon Prime Day 2024 is nearly here. The annual two-day super sale will start on July 16th and run through July 17th, bringing with it a treasure trove of discounts, promos, and exclusive deals for Amazon Prime subscribers. It may not be the only Prime Day event we see this year — Amazon has recently taken to hosting a second shopping event in the fall — but it will likely remain one of the best opportunities of the year to score discounts on a range of tech outside of Black Friday and Cyber Monday.

Like in previous years, we’re highlighting the best deals on a variety of Verge-approved gadgets and gizmos, from the latest laptops and OLED TVs to robot vacuums that can leave your hardwood floors as spotless as your living room carpet....

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: The Verge Staff

item.title: The best early Prime Day deals on Amazon devices
item.description:
Amazon Prime Day may not officially kick off until July 16th, but that hasn’t stopped the retailer from dropping prices on a variety of items ahead of the two-day sale. We’ve already published a detailed guide to the best early Prime Day deals, but if you’re just interested in Amazon devices, this is where you’ll find the ones that are actually worthwhile. From Alexa-based Echo smart speakers to video doorbells, Amazon is discounting a wide range of gadgets, some of which are currently seeing their lowest prices to date.

Of course, the main caveat here is you’ll have to be an active Amazon Prime member to take advantage of any and all Prime Day deals. Luckily, Amazon makes it pretty easy to sign up, especially since new members can...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Sheena Vasani

item.title: Experiment finds AI boosts creativity individually — but lowers it collectively
item.description:
A new study examines whether AI could be an automated helpmeet in creative tasks, with mixed results: it appeared to help less naturally creative people write more original stories — but dampened the creativity of the group as a whole. It’s a trade-off that may be increasingly common as AI tools impinge on creative endeavors. […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: New Senate bill seeks to protect artists’ and journalists’ content from AI use
item.description:
A bipartisan group of senators has introduced a new bill that seeks to protect artists, songwriters, and journalists from having their content used to train AI models or generate AI content without their consent. The bill, called the Content Origin Protection and Integrity from Edited and Deepfaked Media Act (COPIED Act), also seeks to make […]

item.title: AI prompts can boost writers’ creativity but result in similar stories, study finds
item.description:
Ideas generated by ChatGPT can help writers who lack inherent flair but may mean there are fewer unique ideas

Once upon a time, all stories were written solely by humans. Now, researchers have found AI might help authors tell a tale.

A study suggests that ideas generated by the AI system ChatGPT can help boost the creativity of writers who lack inherent flair – albeit at the expense of variety.

Continue reading...

It's official: Best Buy's Black Friday in July sale is during Prime Day
item.description: Best Buy finally announced a Prime Day competition sale. But some summer deals are already live, like a $449 75-inch Toshiba TV.

item.title: Best early Prime Day Apple deals: Tons of iPads are on sale
item.description: Early Prime Day deals are bringing the heat: the Apple AirPods Max are down to a new low price of $398 and the M2 MacBook Air is $799.

item.title: Running out of space? A lifetime of 1TB of cloud storage for $120 could do the trick
item.description: Take advantage of this discount on a lifetime of 1TB of Koofr Cloud Storage on sale for $119.97 with coupon code KOOFR40 until July 21.

item.title: Cybertruck owner discovers new way the Tesla EV can rip your finger off
item.description: A new design flaw has been discovered in the Tesla Cybertruck and it already sent one rider to the emergency room with a cut finger.
